entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
